Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing immediately after SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants that include SW-Awaiting EIC Decision followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision instances that are preceded by at least one occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in comparison to the frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants containing SW-Awaiting EIC Decision that also contain multiple occurrences of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are eventually followed by a final editorial decision (SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs at least twice
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision events that occur within 7 days after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision relative to the total number of reviewer-related activities (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response) in the log
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants ending in acceptance (SW-EIC Accept) among all variants that pass through SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing directly after a revised manuscript submission confirmation (e.g., Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation or Resubmission Manuscript Submission Confirmation)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are not followed by any further reviewer assignment activities (indicating closure of the review phase)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases where 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing after a major revision cycle (i.e., after SWâ€“Major Revision due in 1 month or similar activities)
Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurring in variants that ultimately lead to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit
